comments.body: No menos no seas malo estonses de que te cirbe jugar minecraft mejor seria como un trabajador que tu le das comida y según a eso el trabajara
I have a similar idea instead it's a illager and it helps during raids by breaking in.
Since the next major update will be the cave update, a miner villager that sells TNT, rails, and mine carts.
Awesome idea !!
and you can hire them with amethyst
Maybe they just increase the chances of getting fish
and i think it would be better if they make the rod way faster with fishing
I agree! I think it should make it easier to catch fish, but if you don’t have bait you can still catch fish it’s just harder.
What is in some generated structures, you could find enchanted “lures” that would increase you chances of getting treasure from fishing.
Maybe you can turn Rotten Flesh into small Rotten Chunks for fish to eat. Perhaps seeds could be used!
Yes, after the great collaspe of the Minecraftian Empire many people looked to new gods.
He, him? I thought there was multiple of them, and that they were ether male and female.
No, gillagers are be water-breathing villagers (GILL-agers).
The golem does make running noises, but I do believe they should make a grunting sound every now and then
In dungeons, they have an idle sound, which is faint breathing. This would fit the base ones perfectly.
Me gustaria que el iron golem golpee alos creepers ya que es muy molesto que solo los ignore
Maybe an illager that can swing a flail and do major damage on iron golems
A harpooner illager would make sense, but if it throws harpoons it should be strictly in raids near the ocean.
That would be awesome, and then we could give them hair! It would create so many possibilities!
not bad not bad at all
maybe they raise their prices if you kill the golem.

I love this idea! It's the little things that add up to make the game greater! Although even if they did look at endermen's eyes it wouldn't do anything, however that visual detail is important! Really hope it's added to "Cave Update" because I think endermen are weirdly related to caves! Thanks for your brilliant idea!
Well if you think about it they mostly look forwards not up alot
This addition is unnecessary but it’s a small detail that I really enjoy, I love it and it would definitely bring more life in the game even if it’s a small detail.
Yes this makes a lot of sense, if players aren't allowed to look at endermen why not villagers
That sounds like a much better idea, than nurfing golem farms, without an alternative.

Thank you please. Super needed for me. I am a type of minecrafter who playes without killing friendly mobs, but need vast quantities of iron as a technical man, so am caught in my morale dilemma. With this I will be able to play this sandbox game much better.
OR, have villagers sell Iron, and the Pillagers drop emeralds still.

I think both this and some other sources of iron are quite warranted. Iron is a very important resource, especially for me as I'm a casual player who relies heavily on iron for many purposes, especially tools. Villager trading for ores could be another new source, along with this.
I love the idea, and also there should be a statistic that shows players' reputation.
you should be able to buy forgiveness from the priest
Interesting. So, the piagers want "protection monney?"
interesting concept something like protection money?
Interesting. That would allow illagers and villagers to interact without attacking each other.
I like the idea of that, but only if they add some sort of protection to the villagers because for now, they can barely survive in a village, much less survive in the wilderness
More like Villager Caravans because villagers don't have a reason to patrol
They could also get into minor skirmishes with illager patrols in the wilderness.
Changed subject line to be more compact and easier to find in a search. Please keep our subject lines short, as it also keeps the URL easy for people to share!

Thank you very muchly, I’ll try to bear that in mind for future posts.

@Mc Rat

Thank you very muchly!

I know this is an old post, but I think it's relevant now more than ever. I just recently started building a large build in a snowy biome. It's been frustrating clearing out all the snow constantly just to see my build. Not to mention all the plants that get covered in snow and after shoveling the snow breaking the plants.

If not villagers shoveling the snow, then maybe a beacon ability that warms the area to keep snow from ever sticking in a certain radius maybe?
It is very bad. Voted!
Definitely!
Yes please
I've been waiting for this, this is awesome!
Yes this is A great idea Plus if they make villagers generated names and certain personalities from A pool of them then it would truly rebalance villagers
The minecraft/slave associaton is hard to pass. All Villagers have dark skin and can be "tamed"... How is that Mojang did not catch this?
Also, I think there should be a way for raids to turn a normal village into a pillaged village (if the player fails)
Neat idea!
I think this is a great idea to honor the cat from bobi.
I think the way to gain their trust should be different, but I love this idea nonetheless.

I think that if you join them you should get a "wage" for every village you attacked something like food , weapons , armour . Also if you get hired to a captain or something you can use your pillagers for hunting , carrying loot or helping with hostile mobs and bosses . Besides all of this Nice idea!
Do I hear a sequel to Minecraft dungeons?
I like this idea and maybe..... The villagers are the evil ones
I love this idea! Not only do nitwits stay useless they now are amusing while they are useless. It’s perfect! Pure Genius!
i would definitely chuckle watching a frustrated librarian throw a poisonous potato back and forth- i love this idea of a nitwit update
Their names should be changed to Silligers!
The character creator shouldn’t require internet or Nintendo account or Microsoft account or PlayStation account
we need this!
No that would be annoying because you can just put a lead on a boat with villagers
this is probably the best solution I've heard for getting villagers to follow you, please upvote!
I'd like to see this implemented! Perhaps if the number of emeralds is related to the Reputation the player has with the Villager, similar with how Gossiping works?
that is a great idea,I love it please add this to minecraft mojang.
if you make really loud sound they never give mending
